Questions.Question: You borrowed money from a friend. What is the most convenient way to pay back the money?
Questions.Explanation: Digital wallets like PayPal allow instant transfer of funds directly between parties. This provides a quick, easy way to repay money owed to someone remotely, without needing to withdraw cash or use slower options like cheques or bank transfers. Digital payments are convenient and immediate.

Answers.Text: Transfer the money using a digital wallet (for example, PayPal)
Write a cheque
Withdraw money from an ATM
Promise to give back the money the next time you see each other
